Description:
Tbot Techno Systems, an IT solutions and services company, is currently looking for a talented Business Development Associate to join their team. As a Business Development Associate, you will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building and maintaining relationships with clients, and fostering growth by creating customized solutions to fit their specific needs. You will work closely with the sales and marketing team to develop and implement strategies that align with the company's goals. Tbot Techno Systems is committed to delivering unparalleled custom IT solutions that empower businesses and contribute to their success.Prospect and qualify potential clients to generate new business leads.
Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential clients.
Research and analyze market trends to develop and implement sales strategies.
Collaborate with the sales and marketing team to create customized, innovative solutions for clients.
Prepare and deliver presentations and proposals to clients.
Negotiate contracts and agreements with clients.
Participate in industry events and conferences to expand the company's reach and build networks.Job Details
